item.title: Old Age Originations
item.description: In my previous post I discussed how credit score inflation contributed to the flurry of mortgage originations in 2020-2021. As you can see from the chart below, the scale of the mortgage boom was truly unprecedented: Another part of the story is the flurry of older people taking out mortgages, which was vastly higher than in any previous period. The rise of the 70+ cohort is particularly impressive. Life expectancy at birth in the US is ~75 (79 for women, 73 for men), but healthy men reaching 70 can expect to live till 85.
